items.name: High Tea
items.description: Indulge in a luxurious dining experience with our High Tea Buffet and Mini High Catering services in Singapore! Our expert chefs have crafted a menu filled with a variety of delicious mini treats and delectable finger foods, perfect for any special occasion. Whether itâ€™s a bridal shower, a birthday party, or a corporate event, our Mini High Tea Catering and Buffet is sure to impress your guests.
